product_title: Amazon Basics Air Circulator Fan, Desk Fan for Bedroom, Home and Office, With 90-Degree Tilt Head, 3 Speed Settings, Lightweight (3 LBS), 35 Watts, Black, 11.1"W x 6.3"D x 10.9"H
about_product: COMPACT DESIGN: Measuring just 6.3 x 11.1 x 10.9 inches (LxWxH) with three 7-inch blades, this fan occupies minimal space on floors or tables, perfect for various room types such as bedrooms, living rooms, home offices, and kitchens. Enhance airflow and keep cool wherever you are
ADJUSTABLE TILT: Enjoy personalized airflow with a 90-degree variable tilt feature, allowing you to direct the airflow precisely where you need it

3 SPEED SETTINGS: Easily adjust the fan speed to your preference with intuitive settings (0, 1, 2, 3) using the back-mounted control knob. Choose between low, medium, and high speeds for tailored comfort
PORTABLE CONVENIENCE: Weighing only 3 pounds, this fan is effortlessly portable, making it convenient to move around your home to wherever cooling relief is needed
ENERGY EFFICIENT: Save energy without sacrificing performance. With 35 Watts at 120V, this fan provides efficient airflow to help keep your space comfortable while reducing energy costs
MAINTENANCE TIP: For optimal performance and longevity, we recommend brief rest periods between extended uses to allow proper motor heat dissipation
product_description: Product Description               An Amazon Brand.                  From the Manufacturer               Amazon Basics

customers_say: Customers find the fan powerful for its size, moving lots of air with a strong breeze, and appreciate its quiet operation and compact design that's perfect for small rooms. They consider it good value for money and praise its quality. However, the functionality receives mixed feedback, with some saying it works well while others report it stops working. Moreover, durability is a concern as multiple customers report the motor burning out after one month of use.

top_reviews.review_comment: great value, powerful, quiet multi speed fan. amazon basics got it right again. durable, affordable, quiet. adjustable direction settings. purchased several more after this one. good product. great airflow for counters, desk work areas, shop, etc.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: I waited to make a review because I saw a few people saying it doesn't last long, but I can say after having mine for 3 years, it is definitely a hardy little fan. After 3 years it still blows with the same strength as when I got it, it comes with 3 levels, I have it on the lowest every night when I sleep and it's still a decent amount of airflow. I keep this fan on for hours at a time, literally all night every night, and I have been for years and it's still going strong. The noise level in my opinion, it's reasonable for the size and speed it's blowing at. At the lowest setting, it's at the foot of my bed and has a soft whirling that creates a white noise that at this point helps me sleep. Higher levels definitely have a louder noise but I've never needed to use anything other than the lowest setting. It's easy to use, just plug it in and turn it on. The switch is a little counterintuitive though because it goes backwards, the farthest level is the lowest and the first is the strongest. It's overall very lightweight, and you can move and aim the fan up or down to adjust airflow (doesn't move side to side, but it's small enough you can turn the whole thing). It is made of hard plastic, and looks exactly like the picture. When I bought it, it was $15, not sure if the price has changed since then, but considering rhe price, it's an outstanding little fan, and I definitely recommend it. Not a huge financial commitment either if you for some reason end up not liking it.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Powerful, Light, High quality little fan
top_reviews.review_comment: I use this little fan every night to keep my bedroom cool! It seems to be a good quality fan, well made and durable. It has considerable power for a little fan and works very well for me. It is small and light enough that I can tuck it away and bring it back out when needed easily.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: It worked great and a week ago it just stopped and never to start again, I ordered a replacement, I know it’s only 15.00 dollars but to get less than 2 months use, asking for a refund, it’s very quiet
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 5, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: The Amazon Basics fan is compact, lightweight, and surprisingly powerful for its size. At just 6.3 inches deep, it fits perfectly on a desk, nightstand, or small shelf without taking up too much space. The airflow is strong and consistent, making it great for personal cooling in bedrooms, offices, or dorms. It operates quietly, which is a big plus for working or sleeping. The design is simple, sturdy, and easy to use, with adjustable tilt to direct the breeze where you need it. For the price, it’s a very practical and reliable fan.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Great little fan for the money. There’s actually no assembly to it. The size is great for what I want to get for. There’s hardly any noise at all at any speed and the airflow is great. I bought this for my dog! Lol. It’s been so hot and since she is near the ground, I thought this would help circulate the AC around her and she came inside. Definitely would recommend this product.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on September 3, 2025

top_reviews.review_comment: Works well. Looks great. Three different speed selections. No battery, it plugs in. No remote control of course. Power is good. I've had mine for over three years and I've ran it consistently through out the summer months. I even bought a back up just in case the other stops working. I've used my back up sometimes in the bathroom, or I take it on the road when I'm sleeping some where else. Overall, nice product and I would recommend it if you want a personal fan that's easy to clean and to keep you cool when you sleep.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 1, 2025

top_reviews.review_title: Lightweight and decent airflow, but slightly noisy
top_reviews.review_comment: I recently got this fan, and overall, I’m pleased with it. I like that it’s lightweight, which makes it easy to move around the house or take to different rooms. The fan feels compact yet effective, and the airflow it produces seems decent for a fan of this size. I also appreciate the adjustable angle lets me direct the air exactly where I need it, and the three speed settings make it easy to customize the cooling. On the downside, the fan is a bit noisier than I expected, especially on the higher speeds, so it’s something to consider if you’re using it in a bedroom or office where quiet is important. Still, for its price and portability, I think it’s a practical choice if you need a small, moveable fan that delivers solid airflow.
top_reviews.review_date: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2025

top_reviews_global.review_comment: I have had this fan for a couple years now and I literally have it running every day on my beside table at night for white noise to help me sleep. The sound is not loud and is enough to cancel out ambient noises so I can sleep. Yeah, I know it sounds crazy but when it is "too quiet" I can't sleep and any other sounds will snap me out of my sleep. The fan works well for moving air and does a reasonable job at helping keep the room from getting stuffy on a hot day. Don't look for it to move huge volumes of air, the fan is not designed for that. I have been impressed that during 2 Summers now when hot out, this fan runs 24hrs a day. When not hot outside, I run it at night for about 8hrs. That is a LOT of time for the bearings to run and they have performed excellent. It would be interesting to calculate the distance it would have travelled if you took the dimensions of the bearing hub and figure out how many inches of travel in one full 360 degree rotation of the hub. Then multiply by how many full rotations happen per second, then times 60 to equal a minute, then times 60 for an hour then times the average time it has run in a year! LOL...my point is, this little fan has likely spun for thousands of miles on those bearings in 2 years without overheating and it is still going strong! Pretty good for an inexpensive fan when you really think about the wear and durability!

Me gusta mucho su presentación, es tal como se muestra en la imagen, silencioso, de buen tamaño para el escritorio, adjunto foto para comparar con el tamaño de una lap, relación calidad-precio excelente.
Me gustó mucho por su potencia, no es muy ruidoso y es muy practico para espacios pequeños. Yo tengo uno y mi hermana pidió otro por qué le gustó.
We love these fans, we use them everywhere when needed. Good intensity, three speed levels and a solid base to sit on. Great size for what we need.

Qué chulada, tiene muchísima potencia, es silencioso y se puede mover fácilmente, esta ideal para oficina y habitación, por el precio y los materiales valió la pena, se siente de gran calidad, espero que dure.
